div.p: VPRS 5834/P0/1, inward correspondence p. 113, VA 1411 Industrial and Technological Museum, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Allow me, dear Sir Redmond, to beg of you to ask the trustees, your colleagues, to consider kindly, that Mr Hoffmanns salary for December remained as yet unpaid
See also M to W. Clarke, 5 December 1870. and that I would be glad to get for him also his January pay, now due. As far as I can see I myself have to pay him for his work performed for the trustees in Sept, Oct. and part of November last, but I should now be glad to see him paid for the last two months.
MS annotation: 'Payment already made 14th Feb 71'.
